arabic.title: Hobi Wa Hobak (يا سلام على حبي وحبك)
text: يا سلام على حبي وحبك وعد ومكتوب لي احبك
ولا نمشي الليل من حبك يا سلام على حبي وحبك
يا سلام على حبي وحبك ده ماكان على بالي احبك
ولا نمشي الليل من حبك يا سلام على حبي وحبك
يا حبيبي هواك جنني والشوق ملاني جراح
وحياتك تبعد عني وتسبني عشان ارتاح
وانا يعني الماسك فيكي مه قلبي المشغوول بيكي.
اعدرني لاني بحبك مبنامشي الليل من حبك
يا سلام على حبي وحبك وعد ومكتوب لي احبك
مش ممكن اعيش من بعدك ده خيالك جمبي ليلاتي
وبقول لو ربنا ياخدك كنت اعمل ايه يا حياتي
ان شاء الله انت يا حبيبيي يا هنايا وكل نصيبي
لا اوعي يا روحي ده واجب عليا
من ساعة قلبي ما حبك مبنمشي الليل من حبك
يا سلام على حبي وحبك وعد ومكتوب لي احبك
عقبال كل العزال يتهنوا زي هنانا
شوف وشي اصفر ازاي من حبك
شوفي جفني احمر ازاي من حبك
حتعيش يا روحي معايا وانت حياتي ودنيتي
كفاية حب كفاية احسن يضر صحتي
يا سلام على حبي وحبك ده ماكان على بالي احبك
يا سلام على حبي وحبك مبنمشي الليل من حبك
يا سلام على حبي وحبك وعد ومكتوب لي احبك

english.title: From My Love and Your Love
text: Wow from my love and your love, a promise, and it was destined for me to love you
I don't sleep the nights from your love, oh wow from my love and your love
Wow from my love and your love
Wow from my love and your love, it never crossed my mind to fall for you
I don't sleep the nights from your love, oh wow from my love and your love
Wow from my love and your love
Darling, your love is driving me crazy and the longing fills me with scars
I swear by your life, get away from me and leave me to relax
And am I the one that's keeping you? It's my heart that's persistant
Yes, I am at his honor
Forgive me because I love you and cannot sleep the nights from your love
Wow from my love and your love, a promise, and it was destined for me to love you
Wow from my love and your love
I cannot live after knowing you, your shadow is beside me during my nights
And I say if the Lord were to take you from me, what would I do, my dear
God willing (the Lord takes) you my love, my happiness and my destiny
I will set fire to my soul, my dear
No watch your mouth, my dear, it is my duty
From the moment my heart had loved you, I have not slept the nights from your love
Wow from my love and your love, a promise, and it was destined for me to love you
Wow from my love and your love
Do you love me, for real?
What kind of talk is that, Haifa?
May all those who disagree be happy as we are happy
See my face? How it has turned yellow from your love
You see my eyelids? How they have turned red from your love
You live, my dear, with me and be my life and my world
Enough love, enough, this isn't good for my health
Wow from my love and your love, it never crossed my mind to fall for you
Wow from my love and your love, I don't sleep the nights from your love
Wow from my love and your love, a promise, and it was destined for me to love you
Wow from my love and your love

arabic.title: أمي الحبيبة
text: اخبارك ايه وحشانى يامه وكلكم وحشنى
وعامله ايه البعد عنكم والله غصب عنى
يمكن بعيد عنكم اوى لكن قريب منكم اوى
الدنيا مهما فرقتنا عايش بقلبى فى حضن بيتنا
سلميلى يامه على اللى بالى بالك
واقريلها كل كلمه ياما عنها كتبتهالك
سلميلى يامه على اللى بالى بالك
واقريلها كل كلمه يا امى عنها كتبتهالك

english.title: My Beloved Mother
text: Who would never for a second
And I miss all of you
I swear to God is against my will
And say hi to them for me
And say hi to them for me
Say hi to them for me ah
I may be very far from you all but still very close
No matter how much the world drives us apart
I live with my heart in the embrace of our home
Only a powerful authority has taken me away
Your thoughts are on my mind
And read for her every word whenever I write about her to you
Tell her that I'm coming back
And the joyous occassion is near

english.title: I am your Dream
text: And you say: I am in this world
I am your heart, I am your pulse
I am your dream and its meaning
I am your heart, I am your pulse
I am your beauty and its effect
I am your heart, I am your pulse
I am your dream and its meaning
I am your heart, I am your pulse
I am your words and your expressions
I am yesterday, I am tomorrow
I am a word in your chants
I am a step in your road
I am the friend in your nights
I am your love, I am your home
I am yesterday, I am tomorrow

arabic.title: افتكرتني
text: انا قلبى ارتاح ونسيك فى يومين
كان عاش لو حب برئ لسنين

english.title: Are you remmbered me
text: Are you remmbered me and regtful ana said to me I missed you(x4)
now are you see my heart the most valuable love
You think that I was with it ,who are said to me you are an angel.say
said to me what is between us make my heart keep it what is you want make me remmber it
My heart didnt missed you like before
dont make me remmber a heart didnt trust
The love between us havent place now
Are you remmbered me and regtful ana said to me I missed you(x2)
are you wait to cry and i run forwored you
I didnt missed your eyes my heart forget you in two days
it is not mistake when the hearts goes in different ways
if it is true love it would be remains
My heart didnt missed you like before
dont make me remmber a heart didnt trust

english.title: I yearn to her
text: How many times I tried to forget her , but I realise that I yearn to her
Then I take back , and I deny my feelings ,that I'm not for her
How many times I tried to forget her , but I realise that I yearn to her
Then I take back , and I deny my feelings ,that I'm not for her
And I tell people that I still have hope in her
That's only words , that I'm trying to be patient with
Why am I doing this? what am I ? What is my heart?
I'm obviously tortured by love , and running over the one who tired me
On purpos I let the easy road infront of me and go to the hardest one
And people see me like waiting years , they feel sorry for me
I'm obviously tortured by love , and running over the one who tired me
On purpos I let the easy road infront of me and go to the hardest one
And people see me like waiting years , they feel sorry for me
How many times I tried to forget her , but I realise that I yearn to her
Then I take back , and I deny my feelings ,that I'm not for her
How many times I tried to forget her , but I realise that I yearn to her
Then I take back , and I deny my feelings ,that I'm not for her
And I tell people that I still have hope in her
That's only words , that I'm trying to be patient with
Why am I doing this? what am I ? What is my heart?

english.title: Taala
text: Come.. and together we will say the things we have not said
Come.. the night wants us to stay up, so why not stay up?
Come.. and together we will say the things we have not said
Come.. the night wants us to stay up, so why not stay up?
What can be lovelier than us if we were to melt into one another
What can be lovelier than us if we were to melt into one another
If we lived a year from the years we had not lived
Come.. and together we will say the things we have not said
Come.. the night wants us to stay up, so why not stay up?
We shall leave all the people, their talk and the blame
And reach the moon and teach it to love
We shall leave all the people, their talk and the blame
And reach the moon and teach it to love
To love as we do and it's stars will hug it
To love as we do and it's stars will hug it
And if (the moon) became jealous of the love we share, next time we'll keep it a secret (won't tell/teach it how we love)
Come.. and together we will say the things we have not said
Come.. the night wants us to stay up, so why not stay up?

text: وانا لو هانسى .. هانسى ايه ولا ايه
وانا لو هانسى .. هانسى ايه ولا ايه
أنا شايفه .. بعنيا .. حواليا .. زي ملاك
وانا لو هانسى .. هانسى ايه ولا ايه

english.title: Inside Me
text: Sometimes when I stay up late & think
I get surprised I still remember
Inside me.. with me.. in my heart.. all the time
In front of me.. in my dreams.. singing.. & saying
And if I'm to forget, what or what I forget
And if I'm to forget, what or what I forget
In the past we lived the best tale
She has witnessed the prettiest days with me
I see her.. with my own eyes.. around me.. like an angel
And her eyes.. betray her.. & tell me.. I'll wait for you
And if I'm to forget, what or what I forget
And if I'm to forget, what or what I forget
And if I'm to forget, what or what I forget
And if I'm to forget, what or what I forget

arabic.title: جوه في قلبي
text: من العين دى قبل العين دى

english.title: Gowwa fi albi
text: Who is deep in my heart who is my love
Whom if present next to me I would trade years for this
Who is the moonshine and sparkle in my eyes high up and afar
Who is the most precious to me my only love
Who is deep in my heart who is my love
Whom if present next to me I would trade years for this
You are the one my love whom I give my life to
You are the one I wish for my love and the one I build memories with
Who could be more precious to me than you are believe me there isn't
Whom would I live for I live to be with you
Bring me close to my love's arms and keep me there
If I were dreaming don't wake me up why would I want to wake up?
You are the one my love whom I give my life to
You are the one I wish for my love and the one I build memories withx2
Who is deep in my heart who is my love
Whom if present next to me I would trade years for this

english.title: Rouh Alby
text: Where is my heart's soul, why did you leave my poor heart
My heart has melted from the years of separation, ohh from the torture
My heart, why did you leave it why
You wounded it and placed all the blame on it
And you make it (my heart) suffer baby, why?
My heart's soul was in you
It beat only for you, my darling
Now it doesn't matter to you, why?
Who other than you is my lover?
Or my soul other than you.
She left my passion behind and went
When? Will you come back, when?
When will you give me peace, when?
You who has filled me with hurt

arabic.title: سيبها تحبّك
text: سيبها هتحبك يا قلبى حبها تسيبك
هى دى حبيبتك يا قلبى وهو ده نصيبك
لما الشوق بيدوبها زى النسمة تفوت
(x2) واما اللى بتشتاق له يسيبها من احزانها تموت
واما تحس بضعف حبيبها لازم تأسى عليه يا قلبى هنعمل ايه ايه ايه
بتدلع وبتتمنع وتدارى فى قلبها وخلاص
(x2) لا انا عارف دى بتتوجع ولا ما فيش عندها احساس
سيبها هتحبك يا قلبى حبها تسيبك
انساها يا قلبى وفوأ كل دى فى اخر اوهام
(x2) وكفايه كلام متذوق مش بيحوأ فيها كلام
سيبها هتحبك يا قلبى حبها تسيبك

english.title: Sebha hat7ebbak
text: leave her,she'll love you my heart..love here she'll leave you
this is your lover my heart and this is your fate
when the Longing stire her she passes like a nice brethe
and when the one she misses leaves her, she dies of her sadness
and when she feels her lovers weakness she must be tough on him what will we do my heart
she's Coquetting and rejecting and hiding in her heart
i don't know wether she's in pain or she doesn't have feelings
leave her,she'll love you my heart..love here she'll leave you
forget her my heart and refresh at the end all these are illusions
and enough nice words she feel the words
leave her,she'll love you my heart..love here she'll leave you

english.title: Shouf
text: My heart has melted, melted with you
What are you, what are you sweetheart?
What tires me with your love
My heart told you it's words
What, tell me, What else can I do for you?
Why does it tire my heart, why?
If something happens to you like it has to me say why have you forgotten me
So treat my sickness or else I will go
From start to finish my heart and soul are in you
Even when you are not with me I keep you in my mind
How much I've lost with you
Why are you ok with my being hurt
Why do you add more sorrow
Why do you distance yourself from my heart, why?
And you leave my all by myself, why?
Why do you go and leave me in.. [sighs]

arabic.title: شوفي
text: و فى جنه او فى نار

english.title: Listen Up
text: Through love I'd give you my eyes
I'll find you and you'll find me
By your side I want to forget
I want to find in you
I want you to sense me
and to understand me just by the look of my eyes
You are my darling, my love and my angel
I left my life with you
And whether it is in heaven or hell
My darling I would sacrifice myself for you
This world is too big for me
I need your hands in mine
Even if you go away I want you to be
by my side so that our love would grow
And with you I will, once again,

arabic.title: شيل إيدك

وآااه من اللى جرالي ف ثانية
آااه من اللى جرالي ف ثانية

خلاص .. وانت ويايا ولا ثانية هتبقى حزين

I'm here by your side. I'm taking you away.
Don't put your hand on your cheek.
I'm here by your side. I'm taking you away.
I loved you, I'm still loving you... not as much as you (love me), but even more.
I loved you, I'm still loving you... not as much as you (love me), but even more.
Oh, (you can't imagine) what I've experienced in a single moment.
(Completely) a different feeling, a different thing.

english.title: Feinoh
text: on the love and the long distance
my beloved is increasing his Stubbornness
where is the one wich my heart is with
i've never forget him one day
where do we get back together
he'll get my life if he comes to me again
in a day or night without a date
if they describe to him or tell him
how much there is longing in my heart
he'd felt me he'd longed to me
he'd be kept tasting from my tenderness
he keeps getting more and more beautiful
and they tell me to forget ,no i won't,it's imposiible
i won't leave i'll reamain his beloved
i'm after him and the life is long

ur eyes still its story .. u r always in my mind

arabic.title: قول عليا مجنون
text: قول عليا مجنون، قول عليا موهوم
خدها كلمة مني ومن الآخر هتحن في يوم
وبقيت خلاص من غير هواك مش عارف اعيش
خدها كلمة مني ومن الآخر هتحن في يوم
دي حاجات لا يمكن تدخل عقلي، دي متجيش
حد اتعمله ده كله ليه ميحبنيش؟
خدها كلمة مني ومن الآخر هتحن في يوم

you'll be back at the end
you'll be back at the end
you'll ask me to go and i won't go
you'll bring someone to ask me to leave
i can't sleep and i can't do anything about it
and i became desable to live without your love

be hard and you will miss me
this things can't get in my mind(can't belive them)

english.title: Keda Reda
text: when u pass, iwant to talk
what is ur way( the way to her heart ) answer me , answer him
would i pretending to b calm, or i go to her tough
or i suffer and torture, answer him
just tell me what's in ur imagination, u will find it between ur hands
just an information take care my heart u killed him ( mean u make my heart suffer)
just u tell me the way n i'll go on
u like the one who care bout u , or the one who repelling u
or the one who die for u , come n answer him
tell me urself simply, just command n i'll show u ( i'll do any thing u will order me to do)
tell me 1,2,3( things to do ), n i'll do all this
kda reda kda reda, msh 3ayz aktr mn keda
enty bs edeny el seka wana 7asta2fl 3la keda
u want me kind, i'll b kind
n i can also b evil too
not weakness from me, this is just to feel me
otherwise it's planning and tactic (to win ur heart)
o who can make me revenge
from the one who drive me crazy n i accepted
for ur eyes, i'm all urs
i'm ready to walk on the wall
kda reda kda reda, msh 3ayz aktr mn keda
enty bs edeny el seka wana 7asta2fl 3la keda

arabic.title: ناوى إيه
text: ناوى إيه إيه إيه .. ناوى إيه
ناوى تقرب قلبك ليا .. ناوى ولا لا
ولا ناوى تفارق قلبى .. وقادر تنساه
ده هواك .. لو ضاع .. هيضيع معاك قلبى
ناوى إيه إيه إيه .. ناوى إيه
تشهد على الليالى .. الليالى وشاهدة الأيام
إن أنت في قلبى يا روح قلبى .. ياروح قلبى ليك أحلى غرام
غرام .. لا شافوه ولا عرفوه .. قبلنا عشاق
ده هواك .. لو ضاع .. هيضيع معاك قلبى
ناوى إيه إيه إيه .. ناوى إيه
عايزك عن حبك تتكلم .. وتعلم قلبى اللى هواك
قلبي اللى ما حسش بالدنيا .. ولا شافها غير وأنا وياك
وياك .. دوبت دوب يا محبوب .. قلبي معاك
ده هواك .. لو ضاع .. هيضيع معاك قلبى

english.title: What Do You Intend?!
text: What do you intend.. What do you intend
What what what do you intend.. What do you intend
Do you intend to get your heart closer to me.. Do you intend or not
Or do you intend to leave my heart.. & you're capable of forgetting it
Come closer.. & miss me.. give my heart with you some rest
Your love.. if it was lost.. my heart will get lost with you
Come closer, me & my heart are still in love with you
What do you intend.. What do you intend
What what what do you intend.. What do you intend
Nights could testify about me.. Nights, & so the days are witness
That you, in my heart, my heart's soul.. my heart's soul, have the prettiest fondness
A fondness.. never seen, never known.. before us by any lovers
Come closer.. & miss me.. give my heart with you some rest
Your love.. if it was lost.. my heart will get lost with you
Come closer, me & my heart are still in love with you
What do you intend.. What do you intend
What what what do you intend.. What do you intend
I want you about your love to talk.. & teach my heart that fell in love with you
My heart which never felt the life/world.. & never seen it, but only when with you
With you.. I've melted heavily, my beloved.. my heart is with you
Come closer.. & miss me.. give my heart with you some rest
Your love.. if it was lost.. my heart will get lost with you
Come closer, me & my heart are still in love with you
What do you intend.. What do you intend
What what what .. What do you intend
Do you intend to get your heart closer to me...

arabic.title: وانا وانا
text: فى ليل ساهر انت طلتى، فى قمرايا
2x وسؤال حاير امتى تحنى وتبقى معايا

english.title: I, I
text: It is out of my hands 3x
I live only in my dream 2x
A wish to see you, to see you
A hope to find you, to find you 2x
To draw my name around your heart, and dream you will search for me
It is out of my hands 2x
In the long dark night when you alone, is the moon
What can I do amidst such confusion, be compassionate and stay with me 2x
what should I do with the yearning,
when the fire of love burns inside me? 2x
A wish to see you, to see you
A hope to find you, to find you 2x
To draw my name around your heart, and dream you will search for me
It is out of my hands 2x
And I desire a journey to you, alone in the sea of love
and the longing left with a love sea hey u forgotten
He sings: "Your story is love, a novel inside you" 2x
Each night has sang it's song for me
A wish to see you, to see you
A hope to find you, to find you 2x
To draw my name around your heart, and dream you will search for me
and dream you will search for me
It is out of my hands
ahhh it is out of my hands

english.title: Wana Wana
text: me me me or i i i
a paint & around u, around u
my name letters while u r wishing to find me
in my sleepless night u appears in my moon
its a confused question..u be compassionate & stay with me
what should i do with my yearning
and the fire of love brands me
a paint & around u, around u
my name letters while u r wishing to find me
and the longing left with a love sea hey u forgotten
he sing(mawal) ur story is love and a novel inside u
and the (ooohh`s) in my heart sing for me

arabic.title: يانا يانا
text: يانا يانا من حبيبي روحى يانا يانا
قال هيغيب يومين ياويلى راح غاب سنة
خلى قلبى فى نار خلى قلبى فى نار
لو يرجع ليا ويشوف الغالى حالى انا
طب ليه يبعد يهون عليه كده حبنا
دبت من الافكار دبت من الافكار
اسى قلبى عليك اسى قلبى عليك
بشكى منك ليك بشكى منك ليك
ليه سايبنى ليه ليه سايبنى ليه؟
بعدى خدت عليه بعدى خدت عليه

english.title: Yana Yana
text: Yana yana mn 7abibi rou7i yana yana
2alhali fe youmein ya weily ra7 ghab sana
Khala albi fe nar khala albi fe nar
Law yerga3 leya w yeshouf elghali 7ali ana
Tobt mel afkar tobt mel afkar
Hey, hey ya 7abibi, hey ya 7abibi, ama sa7i7 ghadaar
Bashki mnak lee bashki mnak lee
Leih sayebni leih leih sayebi leih

english.title: Dakhl ayounek hakina
text: speak to us for the sake of your eyes
we wouldn't have come hadn't been for your eyes
you made us reach half the distance of the well
and you cut the rope on us
talk to us oh girl of the people(oh strange girl)
the one with tenderness and emotions
from which glass did you drink
water us with the place you drank from
wasaltina lnes el beyryou made us reach half the distance of the well
and you cut the rope on us
